title: Set alias for columns in dataset, but the expression builder still shows the old column names when selecting the dataset.
OB: When I set aliases for columns in a dataset and then go to the expression builder, the old column names are still displayed when I select the dataset.
EB: After setting aliases for columns in a dataset, the expression builder should display the updated alias names when selecting the dataset.
SR:
1. Set aliases for columns in a dataset.
2. Open the expression builder.
3. Select the dataset.
4. Verify that the expression builder displays the updated alias names for the columns in the dataset.
